subject: GUI - Homescreen
description:
As a player of the game, I would like to have a home screen upon opening the game so that I can see a welcome message

Acceptance Criteria :
A welcome message displayed on the screen upon launching the application

subject: GUI - Add Player
description:
As a player, I would like to add myself using the GUI to the game so that I can play

Acceptance Criteria : 
1) A window with a text box to write the player's name
2) A button to "Add" the player to the game
3) A pop-up message indicating "<PlayerName> has successfully registered for the game"

subject: GUI - Help Screen
description:
As a player of the game, I would like to see a help window which describes all the buttons in the game so that it is easier for me to understand the game

Acceptance Criteria : 
1) A help window
2) A list of all the buttons with description displayed in the window
3) Option to close the window

subject: GUI - View Voting System
description:
As a player of the game, I would like to see the voting system adopted for the game so that I can vote accurately

Acceptance Criteria :
1) A window with title "Voting System" displaying the possible vote values
2) An option to close the window

subject: GUI - Add Issues
description:
As a Scrum Master, I would like to add issues/user stories to the game so that the players/development team members can give their estimates

Acceptance Criteria :
1) A window titled "Add Issues" 
2) A text box to add an issue
3) An option to close the window

subject: GUI - View Current Players
description:
As a player of the game, I would like to see the current players of the game so that I know who else is playing the game

Acceptance Criteria : 
1) A button to "View Current Players"
2) A window titled "Current Players List" which opens upon clicking the "View Current Players" Button
3) A list of all the current players displayed
4) An option to close the window

subject: GUI - Launch a new game
description:
As a scrum team member, I would like to be able to launch a new game of planning poker so that I can estimate user-stories/issues 

Acceptance Criteria : 
1) A button to launch a new game
2) A new window which displays a message saying "A new game has been started with the voting system -<PossibleValuesForTheVotes>"

subject: GUI - View the Current Issue / User Story
description:
As a player, I would like to view the current issue/user-story so that I can vote

Acceptance Criteria : 
1) A button to view the "Current Issue"
2) The current issue displayed in text format

subject: GUI - Vote for an Issue / User-Story
description:
As a player of the game, I would like to vote for the current issue/ user-story so that I can give my estimate

Acceptance Criteria : 
1) A button named "Vote Issue" to submit my estimate for the current issue
2) A text-box displayed to enter an estimate
3) A button to "Submit"

subject: GUI - Reset Votes
description:
As a dealer, I would like to reset the votes for an issue/user-story so that we can vote again after a discussion

Acceptance Criteria : 
1) A button displayed to the dealer "Reset Votes"
2) Upon clicking the button, a pop-up should be opened with text "Are you sure you want to reset the votes?"
3) A button on the pop-up to "Reset Votes"

subject: GUI - Current Votes
description:
As a dealer I would like to view the current votes for an issue/user-story so that I can see all the votes

Acceptance Criteria : 
1) A button to view the "Current Votes"
2) A pop-up opened with the list of votes 
3) A button to "Reset Votes"
4) An option to close the pop-up

subject: GUI - Next Issue
description:
As a player of the game, I would like to go to the next issue so that I can proceed in the game

Acceptance Criteria : 
1) A button "Next Issue"
2) The next issue displayed in text format

subject: GUI - Show Report
description:
As a player of the game I would like to view a report with the issues/user-stories and their corresponding votes so that I can see all the votes and issues in one place

Acceptance Criteria : 
1) A button to "Show Report"
2) A list of issues/user-stories displayed in text format displayed in a pop-up
3) A button to close the pop-up

subject: GUI - Display Current Dealer
description:
As a player of the game I would like to have an option to see the current dealer so that I can know who is the dealer for this game

Acceptance Criteria : 
1) A button "Display Current Dealer"
2) A pop-up window opened displaying a message saying "The current dealer is <dealerName>"
3) An option to close the pop-up

subject: GUI - Exit
description:
As a player of the game, I would like to be able to exit from the game so that I can quit the game

Acceptance Criteria : 
1) A button to exit from the game
2) A pop-up displayed with text "Are you sure you want to exit the game?"
3) A button to "Confirm"
4) A button to "Cancel"

subject: GUI - Previous Issue
description:
As a player of the game, I would like to see the previous issue / user-story discussed so that I can see my vote for the previous issue

Acceptance Criteria :
1) The previous issue displayed in a text format
2) The vote of the particular player displayed in text format
3) A button to go to the "Next Issue"

subject: GUI - View User Count
description:
As a player of the game, I would like to view the current user count so that I know how many players are playing the game

Acceptance Criteria :
1) A button to "View User Count"
2) A pop-up displayed with a text displayed "Currently there are <X> Players in the game"
3) An option to close the pop-up

subject: GUI - Remove Player
description:
As a dealer/Scrum Master I would like to remove a player so that I can remove them from the game

Acceptance Criteria : 
1) A button to "Remove a player"
2) A pop-up displayed with the user's names, and a button displayed beside each user's name to "Remove Player"
3) An option to close the pop-up

subject: Web Interface Development
description:
As a player, I would like to be able to play this game on web so that I can play this game from my browser

Acceptance Criteria:
A fully functional web interface supporting all the features and commands on the game

subject: Scrum Master Role in the Game
description:
As a stake holder, I would like to have a scrum master in the game so that the scrum master can add or remove a player

Acceptance Criteria :
1) Dealer Role Renamed to Scrum Master
2) Option to add a player
3) Option to remove a player

subject: Save the Game Status
description:
As a stakeholder, I would like to save the status of the game so that we can quit the game and resume again at a later time

Acceptance Criteria :
1) An option to "Save Game" displayed to the dealer
2) An option to view the saved games
3) An option to resume a saved game

subject: Descriptive HTTP Status Messages
description:
As a player of the game, I would like to see descriptive messages for a particular HTTP status code so that I know what the problem is 

Acceptance Criteria: 
1) A descriptive text displayed along with the HTTP status code upon receiving the response
2) A descriptive text for every possible HTTP status code

subject: Auto Locate Server in a LAN
description:
As a player of the game, I would like to auto locate a server on the LAN so that I can connect to the game

Acceptance Criteria : 
1) An option to auto locate a server on the LAN 
2) Details of the server displayed to the user upon auto locating

subject: Provide an option to estimate for user stories
description:
As a member of a organisation, I would like to be able to use this game for estimating user stories so that I can estimate user stories

Acceptance Criteria : 
1) An option to play the game to estimate user stories with all the functions as playing the game to estimate issues

subject: Add epics option to the game
description:
As a member of an organisation, I would like to use this game to estimate epics so that we have an estimate for epics

Acceptance Criteria : 
1) An option to add epics to the game
2) An option to view the user stories part of the epics
3) An option to vote for the entire epic
4) An option to vote for an individual user story part of an epic

subject: Estimate Business Value and Story Points in the Game
description:
As a player of the game, I would like to have an option to estimate business value of a user-story or an epic so that we can estimate business value of a user-story or an epic

Acceptance Criteria : 
1) An option to enter the business value for a user story in the regular flow of the game

subject: Import Stories and Team from Taiga
description:
As a player of the game, I would like to import user stories and team members as players of a game so that I can easily add user stories and players to a game

Acceptance Criteria : 
1) A button to "Import from Taiga"
2) A text box to provide the URL of taiga project
3) A button to confirm
4) A button to cancel

subject: Export Estimates to Taiga
description:
As a player of the game, I would like to export the final estimates as the end of a game for a user story to Taiga so that we can assign the estimate to the particular user story in Taiga

Acceptance Criteria : 
1) A button to "Export Estimate to Taiga"
2) Upon clicking the button, the estimate should be exported to taiga
3) The estimate should be visible in taiga for that particular user story

subject: Chatbox for Players
description:
As a player of the game, I would like to have a chatbox so that we can discuss high and low estimates for a user story

Acceptance Criteria : 
1) A chatbox with option to send a message to all users
2) The message should be displayed in chatbox to all the users

subject: Record Chatbox history for a game
description:
As a player of the game, I would like to have a  transcript of the chatbox for a particular game recording all the messages so that I can see all the assumptions and conversations in a game

Acceptance Criteria : 
1) An option to export all the messages of chatbox to a text file
2) An option to download the text file to local drive
